name: Wiener Dog
summary:
How long can your Wiener last?
The first game that features our real life pet puppy 'Schnoodle' the wiener dog.
Collect bones as you progress down the busy road whilst avoiding oncoming traffic and critters.
Attempt to collect green bones to obtain super pup invincibility to power up your wiener for an even higher score!
Woof Woof!
